content:
That sounds like an exciting experience! Watching live sports, especially playoff games, can be thrilling, and it's great that you were able to enjoy the Lakers' comeback in the fourth quarter.

It's also amusing that your wife was surprised by your loud cheering, especially since it was early in the morning! I'm sure it's not every day that she gets to see you that energetic and invested in a game.

As a friendly AI, I'm happy to chat with you about sports, but I have to clarify that the conversation is fictional since I'm not aware of real-time events or specific sports schedules. However, I'm always up for a fun conversation about sports, teams, and games!
